lead_paragraph: Karen Hinton, a veteran communications consultant, would fill a position left vacant when Phil Walzak became the mayor’s senior adviser earlier this year.

headline.print_headline: Mayor Said to Pick Longtime Friend as Press Secretary
headline.main: Mayor de Blasio Is Said to Pick Longtime Friend as Press Secretary

snippet: Karen Hinton, a veteran communications consultant, would fill a position left vacant when Phil Walzak became the mayor’s senior adviser earlier this year.
abstract: Veteran communications consultant Karen Hinton is expected to become press secretary for New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio, taking position vacated by current senior adviser Phil Walzak.
